repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains Aṃśa 8, Adhyāya 1-30 of Śivarahasya. One flower shaped button with a string of thread used for tying the manuscript . 2 guard pages , 9 blank 75 written

msItem.title: Śivarahasya

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 155-160 VOHD II,7: Nr. 2487 p-887 Shiva Rahasya part. 8 By Bhairo Prasad Pathak Sanskrit Manuscript Jangamwadi Math Collection (uploaded on Archive org. Devanagari ms.)

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 dhīnnāgabṛndasadṛśānananāgabhuṣapremāspadāṃgamagajāmukhapadmamitraṃ tanno numaḥ . praṇatavighnaharaṃ gaṇeśamiśā 1v 2 tmajaṃ śaravaṇotbhavavandyamādyaṃ . śrīsutaḥ . jaigīṣavyaḥ praṇamānyaṃ praśnaṃ cakre munīśvarāḥ skandal nanditabṛndārabṛndaṃ saṃhṛtatārakaṃ
msItem.explicit: 75v 4 śuṇḍādaṇḍyavimarditāṇḍakaṭabidghororusaṃbṛṃhitaiḥ uccairyoṣaparāyaṇāgajavarādantitvagāśāṃbaraṃ 75v 5 saṃpujyapramathāthināthamagajāste sadā . bīmoṃśaḥ kathitoṣṭamoṣṭakatukaśrīpādapadmāryakaiḥ śśrotavyassakalāyaśailabhiduromārāribhaktipradaḥ 75v 6 śrīdevyaikathitomaheśavadanāktaktasyamukto mayā . kiṃ bhūyaḥ paripṛcchate navamudā tatcamiśaiva vāgṛṇe ..
msItem.finalRubric: 75v 6 iti śrīśivarahasye ṣṭamāṃśe śivagaurisaṃvāde 75v 7 triṃśodhyāyaḥ . …. …. śīvārpaṇamastu śrīmade {2 illegible syllables} kāṃbāyai namaḥ . tripurasundarisabhāryaṃ avighnamastu …

support.p: Thick wooden guard covers. Front guard with white pigment patches.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

additions.desc: Title Śivarahasyasy aṣṭamāṃśaḥ on 1v in the left margin.
śubhamastu oṃ on 1v in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: Śivarahasyam Thanjavur Sarasvati Mahal Series 1992 -2006, edi by Sri Krishnamurthy Sastri Senior Pandit Sri Sarasvati Mahal Library Tanjavur.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
